text: The Church of St Peter, Cowleigh, is a Grade II listed Anglican church in the parish of Malvern Link and Cowleigh. It was built in 1865, and was designed by George Edmund Street. ==Gallery== ==References== ==External links== *Official Site *Historic England *Church of England Category:Buildings and structures in Malvern, Worcestershire Category:Church of England church buildings in Worcestershire Category:Grade II listed churches in Worcestershire
title: Church of St Peter, Cowleigh
